C.A. WRIT No. 146-20:
I. 
Is the 2nd Respondent a statutory authority?
The 2nd Respondent has admitted that the 2nd Respondent, National Youth
Service  Council  is  a  statutory  body.    However,  the  said  National  Youth
Service  Act  No.  69  of  1979  had  not  provided  any  provisions  as  stated  in
In the said circumstances, it can be admitted that the 2nd Respondent is a
